alert.note: Alert for Haleakala Summit; Kipahulu; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Central Valley South; Maui Leeward West; Maui Windward West; South Haleakala; South Maui, Upcountry; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 4:02AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT MAUI IN MAUI COUNTY THROUGH 530 AM HST... At 401 AM HST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from 7 miles west of Lahaina to 9 miles southwest of Makena. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 35 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kahului, Kihei, Lahaina, Honokohau, Haliimaile, Kipahulu, Wailuku, Makawao, Paia, Keokea, Olowalu, Wailea, Waihee, Kaanapali, Napili-Honokowai, Kula, Pukalani, Kapalua, Puunene, and Pauwela. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
